app.name: MyFusion Notes
app.short_description: Use AI to sync tickets to your CRM.
app.long_description: MyFusion Notes connects Zendesk to Keap, HubSpot, and Salesforce. It uses AI to summarize ticket interactions and syncs them as enriched notes to your CRM contact records.
app.installation_instructions:
1. Install the app.
2. Navigate to a ticket.
3. Open the sidebar to connect your account.
